TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate ServerCertificateSelectionCallback(object sender, string? hostName);
.class public auto ansi sealed ServerCertificateSelectionCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ServerCertificateSelectionCallback(sender As Object, hostName As String) As X509Certificate
type ServerCertificateSelectionCallback = delegate of obj * string -> X509Certificate
public delegate System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate ServerCertificateSelectionCallback(object sender, string hostName);

Docs.param: The host name requested by the client. If the client doesn't use the host_name TLS extension, the is an empty string.
Docs.summary: Selects the server Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate.
Docs.returns: An used for establishing an SSL connection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The server uses this delegate to select a server connection certificate.
This delegate is used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class. The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class is used to help secure information exchanged between a client and server.
